OUR SMOOTHIES

Banana Bonanza

(Banana + Peanut Butter + Almonds + Dates + Milk of choice)

Dive into a whirlwind of flavor with our best-selling Banana Bonanza Smoothie Drink. Creamy bananas meet the rich nuttiness of peanut butter, accompanied with the natural sweetness of dates, all blended to perfection with creamy milk. This blend is a meal in itself withtrue celebration of taste and texture without the compromise of healthy nutrients to keep you full all-day-long.

Green Machine

(Green Grapes + Spinach + Cucumber + Ice)

Welcome our powerhouse health drink, the "Green Machine." Packed with the goodness of nature's finest greens, including crisp green grapes, nutrient-rich spinach, and refreshing cucumber. Served over ice for a refreshing chill to deliver a burst of freshness and essential nutrients to fuel your day.

Blueberry Burst

(Blueberry + Banana + Apple + blue spirulina )

Savor the goodness of nature with our "Blueberry Burst" smoothie, crafted with succulent blueberries, ripe bananas, crisp apples, and a boost of superfood blue spirulina. This vibrant blue blend not only tantalizes your taste buds but also nourishes your body with antioxidants and essential nutrients.

Berry Christmas

(Strawberry + Blueberry + Mulberry + banana + Milk)

Our Berry Christmas smoothie is a burst of festivity in advance with a tantalizing blend of vibrant strawberries, plump blueberries, and exotic mulberries, harmoniously fused with creamy banana and milk. Embark on a journey of flavor with this antioxidant-rich concoction, delivering a burst of freshness in every sip.

Heart Beat

(Apple, beetroot, orange, carrot and ice)

Nourish your body and invigorate your senses with our revitalizing health drink, "Heart Beat." Crafted with a blend of crisp apples, earthy beetroot, zesty oranges, and sweet carrots, each sip is a tsunami of flavors packed with essential nutrients. Served over ice for a refreshing chill, this vibrant booster will get your heart pumping with vitality and wellness.

Choco-mate

(Banana + Cacao Powder + Oats + Dates + Milk)

Your favourite chocolate flavor is now available in a guilt free smoothie with our delectable blend of creamy banana, rich sugarfree cacao powder, wholesome oats, sweet dates, and velvety milk. Savour the gut-friendly fibres of oats along with chocolatey goodness in every sip, as the smooth texture and heavenly flavors dance on your palate.

Ma-Papa Smoothie Drink

( Mango + Papaya + Honey + Milk)

Indulge in a taste of the unconditional love with our Ma-Papa Smoothie Drink where an unconventional combination of ripe mangoes and succulent papaya come together in perfect harmony, complemented by a drizzle of golden honey and blended with creamy milk. Each sip is a tropical escape, brimming with natural sweetness and nourishing goodness.

Pink Ban-Dra Smoothie Drink

(Banana + Dragon Fruit + Cranberry + Pitaya Powder + Milk)

Our local Bandra has come with a crazy twist of flavours and colours as we bring together the creaminess of bananas with the exotic allure of dragonfruit , balanced with tart sweetness of cranberries blended in perfection with nourishing milk in our rich pink smoothie drink. This vibrant pink smoothie is not just visually stunning but also a delightful fusion of tropical flavours.

Planet Pandora Smoothie Drink

(Papaya + Cashew + Blue spirulina + Cashewnuts + Milk)

Step into a world of vibrancy with our Planet Pandora Smoothie Drink. Ripe papaya and creamy cashews form the base of this celestial concoction, while the addition of exotic blue spirulina adds a mesmerizing hue that evokes the mysteries of distant galaxies. Blended with creamy milk and topped with crunchy cashew nuts, each sip is a journey through the cosmos, bursting with flavor and nourishment.
